resources.string:
Secure Connection and Privacy Assurance

Techducat Limited is committed to safeguarding your privacy on the "6°" mobile application (the "App"). We want to ensure that you have all the necessary information about how we protect your privacy.

1. Secure Connection: When you use the App, your connection to our relay server at https://18.222.150.108:3001 is secured through HTTPS. This ensures that your data is transmitted securely over the network, enhancing your privacy and data protection.

2. Unique Identifier: We assign you a unique identifier on the peer-to-peer network, created using SHA-256 encryption, which generates a 64-character string that cannot be reversed (decrypted). This identifier serves as your identity on the network and is kept secure.

3. Contact List: We encrypt your contact list using SHA-256 encryption, which generates a list of 64-character strings that cannot be reversed (decrypted) just like your own identifier. These identifiers serve as the identities of your peers on the network and are shared with other peers by sending to the relay server at https://18.222.150.108:3001 through an HTTP connection.

4. Contact List Usage:The encrypted identifiers derived from the Contact List serve as the identities of your peers on the network and are shared with other peers by sending them to the relay server at https://18.222.150.108:3001 through an HTTP connection.

5. Privacy Assurance: We take your privacy seriously. We do not disclose your unique identifier (SHA-256 string) to any third parties, as it is designed to be unrecoverable. Your identity remains secure and anonymous on our network.

6. Minimal Information: The only required information for using the App is your cellphone number, which is solely used for creating your unique identifier. We collect minimal personal information, and we do not intentionally collect any additional personal information from children under 13. The App is available for users of all ages.

7. Security Measures: We have implemented robust security measures to protect your information, including your unique identifier. The use of HTTPS ensures that your data is encrypted during transmission, maintaining the security and anonymity of your identity on our network.

8. Changes to Our Policies: We may update our policies to reflect changes in our practices or for other reasons. You will be notified of any material changes through the App.

Location-Based Features

The "6°" app by Techducat Limited includes location-based features to enhance your experience. Here\'s what you need to know:

1. GPS Location: We may collect your GPS location data to compute the distance to resources, such as skills or listings, that may interest you. This allows us to provide you with more relevant and personalized content.

2. User Consent: Your GPS location data is collected only with your explicit consent. You can control the access to your location data through your device settings.

3. Privacy Assurance: We take your privacy seriously. Your location data is used solely for enhancing your experience within the app. We do not share this data with third parties without your consent.

4. Opt-Out: If you prefer not to share your GPS location, you can opt-out at any time through the app\'s settings.

By continuing to use the app, you agree to the collection and use of your GPS location data as described above. For more details, please read our full Privacy Policy.



If you have any questions or concerns about your privacy, data security, or how we handle your information, please contact us at niyid@techducat.com.

By continuing to use the App, you agree to the practices outlined in this Prominent Disclosure and our Privacy Policy.

Last Updated: 26/09/2023

Techducat Limited ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use the "6°" mobile application (the "App") and connect to our relay server at https://18.222.150.108:3001 (the "Relay Server").

Please take a moment to read this Privacy Policy carefully. By accessing or using the App and Relay Server, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not use the App or Relay Server.

1. Information We Collect

1.1. Information You Provide: When you use the App, you may provide us with certain information, including but not limited to:

  • Your cellphone number, which serves as your unique identifier on the network.

  • Published skills or content you share through the App.

1.2. Identity Encryption: We create a unique identity for you on the peer-to-peer network using a SHA-256 encrypted 64-character string. This string is designed to be irreversible (unrecoverable) and is used to maintain your anonymity on the network.

1.3. Contact List (of phone numbers): Your list of contacts are SHA-256 encrypted and shared with your peers on the network through the relay server at https://18.222.150.108:3001/ This relay server ensures that you stay connected to your peers whom are also your phone using the app (those are the only possible peers).

2. How We Use Your Information

We may use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

  • To provide and improve the App and Relay Server.

  • To facilitate peer-to-peer communication.

  • To respond to your requests and inquiries.

  • To ensure the security and integrity of our services.

  • To comply with legal obligations.

3. Disclosure of Your Information

We do not disclose your unique identity (SHA-256 encrypted string) to any third parties, as it is designed to be unrecoverable. However, we may share your published skills or content with other users on the peer-to-peer network as part of the App\'s functionality.

4. Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your information, including your unique identity, from unauthorized access and disclosure. The SHA-256 encryption is designed to maintain the security of your identity.

5. Children\'s Privacy

The App is available for use by children under the age of 13. We collect minimal personal information, and we do not intentionally collect any additional personal information from children under 13. We encourage parents or guardians to review their child\'s use of the App.

6. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on our website or within the App.

7. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at niyid@techducat.com.
You must accept the privacy policy by checking the box above.
